short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add your current classes and exams to Google Calendar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: From your ucsb gold account open up your course schedule for the current quarter. Once you're there, click on the extension icon next to the address bar to add your class and exam schedule to your Google Calendar.
